# IConsoleBuffer.Flip method

Mirrors the content of a console buffer horizontally and/or vertically

```csharp
public void Flip(bool horizontal, bool vertical)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| horizontal | If true, mirror horizontally. If false, no horizontal mirroring is performed. |
| vertical | If true, mirror vertically. If false, no vertical mirroring is performed. |
